title: Cobod
text: ### Variety is the spice of life! Cobod is the Collective Body base program. We partner with our hosts to deliver ever-changing workouts, nutrition advice, and motivation and mindfulness practices each month. Use it to taste test various hosts, or to jazz up your life for the long term. Yum!

title: Sweat for Sweat!
text: ### We’ll reward your hard work and dedication with free credits to our cobod program. For every month on a Collective Body trainer program you’ll receive a free day on cobod!  Save them for a rainy day or gift them to a CB newbie! Post a workout, cook-up, or mindfulness practise on social to receive free minutes. Simply tag us and you’ll receive an invite.

title: Take that break!
text: ### It’s all about moderation!  We all need a break from time to time.  If you’re heading off on a holiday or just need a time out, drop us a line and whilst we can’t suspend our trainer programs, we’ll issue you time in lieu credit on our cobod program! No need to feel guilty, just come back refreshed and raring to go!
